*

Bleeding Through

Dec 30, 2011

The swimmers tore through the waves and towards the golden light - metaphorically speaking of course. One swimmer turned back around towards the shore, and having reached it, began swimming back out began walking in the sand back out to that great place in the ocean. To the place of animal dreams. Only a few swimmers made it to the golden light to the book. A young man in dreds was among those fortunate to reach the purple waters surrounding it. He smiled as he looked around. Another male swimmer came from below and they smiled at each other and shared a kiss of mutual joy. But as the man in dreds pulled away, the other swimmer went up for another kiss, and they passionately embraced. (“This is certainly not allowed in DWD.”) All around was an intense joy that would never be diminished and never surpassed. The purple book.
